title: MMSummary: Multimodal Summary Generation for Fetal Ultrasound Video
details: X Guo, Q Men, JA Noble - arXiv preprint arXiv:2408.03761, 2024
abstract: We present the first automated multimodal summary generation system, MMSummary, for medical imaging video, particularly with a focus on fetal ultrasound analysis. Imitating the examination process performed by a human sonographer …
